Entries.DialogueText: Ah, Mayor Lewis told me you just arrived. I'm Marnie!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, Mayor Lewis told me you just arrived. I'm Marnie!

Entries.DialogueText: I sell livestock and animal care products at my ranch. You should swing by some time. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I sell livestock and animal care products at my ranch. You should swing by some .

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, thanks a million, {Farmer_Name}. I won't forget this!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, thanks a million, . I won't forget this!

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, {Farmer_Name}. I always like to have a copy of the Almanac around. It's pretty accurate! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, . I always like to have a copy of the Almanac around. It's pretty accurate!

Entries.DialogueText: I think you'll love having a little friend on the farm with you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think you'll love having a little friend on the with you.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm sure %pet will be a little shy at first. It takes a while for an animal to get comfortable in a new setting.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sure will be a little shy at first. It takes a while for an animal to get comfortable in a new setting.

Entries.DialogueText: Has little %pet settled in yet? It's such a nice property for a pet to explore.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Has little settled in yet? It's such a nice property for a to explore.

Entries.DialogueText: I just remembered... it's been about a year since you adopted %pet. I bet you two have grown really close by now!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I just remembered... it's been about a year since you adopted . I bet you two have grown really close by now!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, you got a horse? That's so wonderful! Horses are amazing animals. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, you got a horse? That's so wonderful! Horses are amazing animals.

Entries.DialogueText: Shane seems a lot more positive and hopeful, lately.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shane seems a lot more positive and hopeful, lately.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm so happy you moved here, and that you two get along so well! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm so happy you moved here, and that you two get along so well!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad Shane's moving to your farm... he can keep the family tradition alive!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad Shane's moving to your ... he can keep the family tradition alive!

Entries.DialogueText: Hehe... finally a chance to show off all my hard work at aerobics club. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hehe... finally a chance to show off all my hard work at aerobics club.

Entries.DialogueText: I feel warm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I feel warm.

Entries.DialogueText: Hee hee... It's interesting to see everyone in their bathing suits.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hee hee... It's interesting to see everyone in their bathing suits.

Entries.DialogueText: Ew... the chair's wet.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ew... the chair's wet.

Entries.DialogueText: Phew... It's hot! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Phew... It's hot!

Entries.DialogueText: Gah! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gah!

Entries.DialogueText: ...Um... What? Heh.. I don't know what that is... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Um... What? Heh.. I don't know what that is...

Entries.DialogueText: I love animals, Mr. {Farmer_Name}. If you treat yours well I'm sure we'll become good friends!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I love animals, Mr. . If you treat yours well I'm sure we'll become good friends!

Entries.DialogueText: I just love animals, Ms. {Farmer_Name}. Treat them kindly and we'll become friends, I'm sure!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I just love animals, Ms. . Treat them kindly and we'll become friends, I'm sure!

Entries.DialogueText: Animals are so innocent, so sweet. And If I don't look after them, who will? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Animals are so innocent, so sweet. And If I don't look after them, who will?

Entries.DialogueText: I just hope my chickens aren't too upset when I take their eggs. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I just hope my chickens aren't too upset when I take their eggs.

Entries.DialogueText: You've been here a while, now... how's your farm doing?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've been here a while, now... how's your doing?

Entries.DialogueText: Taking care of animals is easy as long as you don't forget about them! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Taking care of animals is easy as long as you don't forget about them!

Entries.DialogueText: Now that I'm here I can finally relax and socialize a bit.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now that I'm here I can finally relax and socialize a bit.

Entries.DialogueText: There aren't very many people here today... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: There aren't very many people here today...

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} marnieAnimalSal
Entries.DisplayPattern: # marnieAnimalSal

Entries.DialogueText: I spilled a whole bucket of milk on the floor today, it was horrible. And such a waste of my poor Belinda's hard work.$k {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I spilled a whole bucket of milk on the floor today, it was horrible. And such a waste of my poor Belinda's hard work.

Entries.DialogueText: It's nice of you to show up! It's a little more lively now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's nice of you to show up! It's a little more lively now.

Entries.DialogueText: Phew! It sure feels good to kick back after a hard day's work.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Phew! It sure feels good to kick back after a hard day's work.

Entries.DialogueText: Marnie doesn't seem to notice that you're there...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Marnie doesn't seem to notice that you're there...

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... I wasn't very productive today.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... I wasn't very productive today.

Entries.DialogueText: I always see Clint here but he won't talk to anyone. He just glances over his shoulder now and then. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I always see Clint here but he won't talk to anyone. He just glances over his shoulder now and then.

Entries.DialogueText: Now that Shane's gone, I'm going to have to teach Jas how to care for the chickens.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now that Shane's gone, I'm going to have to teach Jas how to care for the chickens.

Entries.DialogueText: My nephew Shane has been staying at my place the last few months.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My nephew Shane has been staying at my the last few months.

Entries.DialogueText: He helps me out with the chickens, so I'm not complaining.
Entries.DisplayPattern: He helps me out with the chickens, so I'm not complaining.

Entries.DialogueText: You're not worried about this rain? That does put me at ease a little...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're not worried about this rain? That does put me at ease a little...

Entries.DialogueText: I just hope the cows tucked themselves in... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I just hope the cows tucked themselves in...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, looks like we all got scared for nothing... The rain was totally harmless!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, looks like we all got scared for nothing... The rain was totally harmless!

Entries.DialogueText: The animals seems to enjoy this rain... I think it's putting extra nutrients into the grass.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The animals seems to enjoy this rain... I think it's putting extra nutrients into the grass.

Entries.DialogueText: You can use a scythe to cut feed from grass.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can use a scythe to cut feed from grass.

Entries.DialogueText: Or you can buy it from me, of course! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Or you can buy it from me, of course!

Entries.DialogueText: I could use the cash... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I could use the cash...

Entries.DialogueText: Adios.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Adios.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. Need something?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi. Need something?

Entries.DialogueText: I might be getting some different kinds of animals in the future.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I might be getting some different kinds of animals in the future.

Entries.DialogueText: Although, I'll need to make sure there's a market for them, so you'll have to prove your skill with animals first.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Although, I'll need to make sure there's a market for them, so you'll have to prove your skill with animals first.

Entries.DialogueText: Just keep treating your animals with respect and good things will happen.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just keep treating your animals with respect and good things will happen.

Entries.DialogueText: You can catch me at the saloon most nights.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can catch me at the saloon most nights.

Entries.DialogueText: Animals are great company, but I need to spend time with people, too.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Animals are great company, but I need to spend with people, too.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if Mr. Lewis gets lonely in that big house of his... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if Mr. Lewis gets lonely in that big house of his...

Entries.DialogueText: It seems so empty in there, doesn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: It seems so empty in there, doesn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: Have you been to that strange tower west of my house?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you been to that strange tower west of my house?

Entries.DialogueText: One time I heard this terrible, otherworldly noise coming from there. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: One I heard this terrible, otherworldly noise coming from there.

Entries.DialogueText: I would avoid that place if I were you...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I would avoid that if I were you...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey there, it's good to see ya!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey there, it's good to see ya!

Entries.DialogueText: Feel free to visit us any time you please.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Feel free to visit us any you please.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi !

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad we've become friends. I know I can trust you to take care of my dear animals.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad we've become friends. I know I can trust you to take care of my dear animals.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, here goes nothing...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, here goes nothing...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I didn't win... but it was still satisfying to share all my hard work!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I didn't win... but it was still satisfying to share all my hard work!

Entries.DialogueText: That was some strange-looking purple lettuce in your grange display! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was some strange-looking purple lettuce in your grange display!

Entries.DialogueText: I swear, it looked just like Mayor Lewis' special und... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I swear, it looked just like Mayor Lewis' special und...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh!... heh... never mind! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh!... heh... never mind!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi {Farmer_Name}. You look like you're soaked...you poor thing! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi . You look like you're soaked...you poor thing!

Entries.DialogueText: Hello {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello !

Entries.DialogueText: You see this dog here?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see this dog here?

Entries.DialogueText: I found it sitting outside the entrance to your farm! I think it's a stray... poor thing. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I found it sitting outside the entrance to your ! I think it's a stray... poor thing.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, it seems to like this place! Hey, um.... Don't you think this farm could use a good dog? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, it seems to like this ! Hey, um.... Don't you think this could use a good dog?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, %pet... You be a good pooch now... okay?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, ... You be a good pooch now... okay?

Entries.DialogueText: Good morning, Mr. {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good morning, Mr. !

Entries.DialogueText: Good morning, Ms. {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good morning, Ms. !

Entries.DialogueText: I came by to ask you a favor, since you're such a kind neighbor.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I came by to ask you a favor, since you're such a kind neighbor.

Entries.DialogueText: You see, I'm trying to train my goats to say 'hello'... but they simply won't pay attention to me unless I have their favorite treat, cave carrots! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see, I'm trying to train my goats to say 'hello'... but they simply won't pay attention to me unless I have their treat, cave carrots!

Entries.DialogueText: So... since I'm scared of the mines... I thought, well, maybe you would bring me a cave carrot when you have the chance?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So... since I'm scared of the mines... I thought, well, maybe you would bring me a cave carrot when you have the chance?

Entries.DialogueText: There's no pressure... but if you want to, just swing by my house between 9:00 AM and 5:00 PM with a cave carrot. You'll make an old girl very happy. Bye.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's no pressure... but if you want to, just swing by my house between 9:00 AM and 5:00 PM with a cave carrot. You'll make an old girl very happy. Bye.

Entries.DialogueText: My goats go wild over cave carrot... I can't imagine why.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My goats go wild over cave carrot... I can't imagine why.

Entries.DialogueText: Hello {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello !

Entries.DialogueText: You see this cat here?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see this cat here?

Entries.DialogueText: I found it sitting outside the entrance to your farm! I think it's a stray... poor little thing. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I found it sitting outside the entrance to your ! I think it's a stray... poor little thing.

Entries.DialogueText: I think it likes this place! Hey, um.... Don't you think this farm could use a good cat? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think it likes this ! Hey, um.... Don't you think this could use a good cat?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, little %pet... You be a good kitty now... okay?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, little ... You be a good kitty now... okay?

Entries.DialogueText: You care too much about your job, Lewis. There are other things to life, you know. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You care too much about your job, Lewis. There are other things to life, you know.

Entries.DialogueText: ...but yes, I understand. I guess we'll have to keep...us...a secret. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...but yes, I understand. I guess we'll have to keep...us...a secret.

Entries.DialogueText: Gahh! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gahh!

Entries.DialogueText: Why were you hiding there, anyway? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why were you hiding there, anyway?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh no... this doesn't look good. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh no... this doesn't look good.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}? You'd better keep your eye on him... next time you catch him coming out of the Saloon, you should say something... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ? You'd better keep your eye on him... next you catch him coming out of the Saloon, you should say something...

Entries.DialogueText: Is everything alright, {Farmer_Name}? You seem worried...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is everything alright, ? You seem worried...

Entries.DialogueText: Alright... we've caught him in the act. Now let's confront him. Take a deep breath... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Alright... we've caught him in the act. Now let's confront him. Take a deep breath...

Entries.DialogueText: Shane... this is what you've been doing in here? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shane... this is what you've been doing in here?

Entries.DialogueText: But... these cans... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But... these cans...

Entries.DialogueText: Um... Haley? When do we stop? M... My legs... *pant* *pant* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Haley? When do we stop? M... My legs... *pant* *pant*

Entries.DialogueText: Yep
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yep

Entries.DialogueText: I do!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I do!

Entries.DialogueText: Mmmm... %farm eggs.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mmmm... eggs.

Entries.DialogueText: Um... Leah? How much longer will this be? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Leah? How much longer will this be?

Entries.DialogueText: ...My knees are quivering, my thighs are whimpering, and I've lost all sensation in my foot. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...My knees are quivering, my thighs are whimpering, and I've lost all sensation in my foot.

Entries.DialogueText: Make me look good!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make me look good!

Entries.DialogueText: Oooh!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oooh!

Entries.DialogueText: I love it! That's going up in my room... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I love it! That's going up in my room...

Entries.DialogueText: Let me see
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let me see

Entries.DialogueText: Em... {Farmer_Name}, why don't you go ahead and keep yours? It might be nice to, uh... own your first-ever painting... ya know? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Em... , why don't you go ahead and keep yours? It might be nice to, uh... own your first-ever painting... ya know?

Entries.DialogueText: Um... Honey? Where were you planning to hang that painting you did? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Honey? Where were you planning to hang that painting you did?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! You brought the cave carrot! Thank you so much, Mr. {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! You brought the cave carrot! Thank you so much, Mr. .

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! You brought the cave carrot! Thank you so much, Ms. {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! You brought the cave carrot! Thank you so much, Ms. .

Entries.DialogueText: This looks great... I almost want to eat it myself! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This looks great... I almost want to eat it myself!

Entries.DialogueText: ...almost.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...almost.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope it wasn't too much trouble... I really do appreciate it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope it wasn't too much trouble... I really do appreciate it.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks again for helping me out. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks again for helping me out.

Entries.DialogueText: ...and my goats say 'thanks' too.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...and my goats say 'thanks' too.

Entries.DialogueText: Shane?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shane?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh dear...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh dear...

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}... Can you do something? He's out cold. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... Can you do something? He's out cold.

Entries.DialogueText: Shane! What's the matter with you? All you do anymore is mope around your room and drink beer! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shane! What's the matter with you? All you do anymore is mope around your room and drink beer!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm worried...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm worried...

Entries.DialogueText: What's your plan? Don't you ever think about the future?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's your plan? Don't you ever think about the future?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi Shane... you look unusually happy today.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi Shane... you look unusually happy today.

Entries.DialogueText: Let me guess... Gus had a clearance sale on canned beer? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let me guess... Gus had a clearance sale on canned beer?

Entries.DialogueText: He looks sharp!
Entries.DisplayPattern: He looks sharp!

Entries.DialogueText: I tried my best, but my display is pretty weak compared to Pierre's. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I tried my best, but my display is pretty weak compared to Pierre's.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, maybe the judges will give me bonus points for the massive cheese wheel.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, maybe the judges will give me bonus points for the massive cheese wheel.

Entries.DialogueText: My animals had a successful year! I'm hoping the high-quality produce will impress the judges. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My animals had a successful year! I'm hoping the high-quality produce will impress the judges.

Entries.DialogueText: How's your grange display, {Farmer_Name}? It's your moment to showcase the fruits of your labor. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's your grange display, ? It's your moment to showcase the fruits of your labor.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. Have you had a productive fall?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, . Have you had a productive fall?

Entries.DialogueText: It's starting to get quite cold... crops won't hold out for much longer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's starting to get quite cold... crops won't hold out for much longer.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope Jas is okay in there. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope Jas is okay in there.

Entries.DialogueText: Did you have a successful year farming, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you have a successful year ing, ?

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to the Egg Festival... compliments of my wonderful brood of hens.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to the Egg Festival... compliments of my wonderful brood of hens.

Entries.DialogueText: Hens lay the eggs, but roosters play an important role, too... they protect the hens and prevent them from fighting with each other!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hens lay the eggs, but roosters play an important role, too... they protect the hens and prevent them from fighting with each other!

Entries.DialogueText: That means happier hens and better eggs... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That means happier hens and better eggs...

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... Love is in the air... And I'm still single. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... Love is in the air... And I'm still single.

Entries.DialogueText: This open field is perfect grazing land for livestock, wouldn't you agree? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This open field is perfect grazing land for livestock, wouldn't you agree?

Entries.DialogueText: Psst... I think Lewis is going to ask me to dance with him! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Psst... I think Lewis is going to ask me to dance with him!

Entries.DialogueText: If you brought something for the soup, climb the stairs on the other side and throw it in.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you brought something for the soup, climb the stairs on the other side and throw it in.

Entries.DialogueText: Hello, {Farmer_Name}! Did you bring an ingredient for the potluck? Just climb the stairs and toss it right in! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello, ! Did you bring an ingredient for the potluck? Just climb the stairs and toss it right in!

Entries.DialogueText: *gasp*
Entries.DisplayPattern: *gasp*

Entries.DialogueText: That's a heavy load of people for an ancient wooden dock! I'll stay over here near the beach.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's a heavy load of people for an ancient wooden dock! I'll stay over here near the beach.

Entries.DialogueText: I can't go any further on the dock. The sounds of creaking wood is causing me to tremble. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't go any further on the dock. The sounds of creaking wood is causing me to tremble.

Entries.DialogueText: When I was a little girl, I fell through a rotten dock once, and it traumatized me... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: When I was a little girl, I fell through a rotten dock once, and it traumatized me...

Entries.DialogueText: Welcome to the Feast of the Winter Star! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welcome to the Feast of the Winter Star!

Entries.DialogueText: Happy Feasting, {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Happy Feasting, !

Entries.DialogueText: I feel bad for all the poor, cold animals out there. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I feel bad for all the poor, cold animals out there.

Entries.DialogueText: Aww... That piggy looks adorable all bundled up! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aww... That piggy looks adorable all bundled up!

Entries.DialogueText: This is an incredible gift! Thanks!!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is an incredible gift! Thanks!!

Entries.DialogueText: Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh. I guess I'll take it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh. I guess I'll take it.

Entries.DialogueText: This is worthless. I don't understand you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is worthless. I don't understand you.

Entries.DialogueText: Thank you! This looks nice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank you! This looks nice.

Entries.DialogueText: I know I'm going to love this movie! It was really nice of you to invite me, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know I'm going to love this movie! It was really nice of you to invite me, .

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, I'm so glad the family was alright in the end. And the cows, too! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, I'm so glad the family was alright in the end. And the cows, too!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm pretty easy-going when it comes to movies... I like just about everything!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm pretty easy-going when it comes to movies... I like just about everything!

Entries.DialogueText: I had a great time, {Farmer_Name}! Thanks for thinking of me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I had a great , ! Thanks for thinking of me.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. I was just thinking about milk.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . I was just thinking about milk.

Entries.DialogueText: Would you ever try camel's milk? I've heard it's salty.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Would you ever try camel's milk? I've heard it's salty.

Entries.DialogueText: I found an extra roll of wallpaper from my house. It's yours for 20 eggs!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I found an extra roll of wallpaper from my house. It's yours for 20 eggs!

Entries.DialogueText: 'I'm not around, but you can still make a purchase using the animal catalogue!' -Marnie
Entries.DisplayPattern: 'I'm not around, but you can still make a purchase using the animal catalogue!' -Marnie

Entries.DialogueText: These sweeties could use a good home...
Entries.DisplayPattern: These sweeties could use a good home...

Entries.DialogueText: Great! I'll send little {0} to your home right away. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Great! I'll send little {0} to your home right away.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Howdy!

Looking for some supplies?
